ingredients: ['2 (400g) tins chopped tomatoes (La Gina)', '1 (400g) tin coconut milk', '1kg chicken thigh fillets, quartered', '2 tablespoons curry paste (Pataks Tikka Masala)', '2 tablespoons of your choice curry powder', '4 tablespoons raw sugar', '2 teaspoons salt', '1 whole chilli (only if you like it hot!)']
